channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-25547|2024-08-02T11:25:18.954Z -- schneider%20electric -- struxureware%20data%20center%20expert
item.description: A CWE-863: Incorrect Authorization vulnerability exists that could allow remote code execution on upload and install packages when a hacker is using a low privileged user account. Affected products: StruxureWare Data Center Expert (V7.9.2 and prior)

item.title: CVE-2023-5985|2024-08-02T08:14:25.120Z -- schneider%20electric -- ion8650
item.description: A CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation vulnerability exists that could cause compromise of a user’s browser when an attacker with admin privileges has modified system values.

item.title: CVE-2023-7032|2024-08-02T08:50:07.764Z -- schneider%20electric -- easergy%20studio
item.description: A CWE-502: Deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists that could allow an attacker logged in with a user level account to gain higher privileges by providing a harmful serialized object.

item.title: CVE-2023-25620|2024-08-02T11:25:19.224Z -- schneider%20electric -- modicon%20m340%20cpu%20%28part%20numbers%20bmxp34%2A%29
item.description: A CWE-754: Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability exists that could cause denial of service of the controller when a malicious project file is loaded onto the controller by an authenticated user.

item.title: CVE-2023-0595|2024-08-02T05:17:50.139Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20geo%20scada%20expert%202019
item.description: A CWE-117: Improper Output Neutralization for Logs vulnerability exists that could cause the misinterpretation of log files when malicious packets are sent to the Geo SCADA server's database web port (default 443). Affected products: EcoStruxure Geo SCADA Expert 2019, EcoStruxure Geo SCADA Expert 2020, EcoStruxure Geo SCADA Expert 2021(All Versions prior to October 2022), ClearSCADA (All Versions)

item.title: CVE-2023-5391|2024-08-02T07:59:44.528Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20power%20monitoring%20expert
item.description: A CWE-502: Deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability exists that could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code on the targeted system by sending a specifically crafted packet to the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-25556|2024-08-02T11:25:19.293Z -- schneider%20electric -- merten%20instabus%20tastermodul%201fach%20system%20m%20625199
item.description: A CWE-287: Improper Authentication vulnerability exists that could allow a device to be compromised when a key of less than seven digits is entered and the attacker has access to the KNX installation.

item.title: CVE-2023-2161|2024-08-02T06:12:20.577Z -- schneider%20electric -- opc%20factory%20server%20%28ofs%29
item.description: A CWE-611: Improper Restriction of XML External Entity Reference vulnerability exists that could cause unauthorized read access to the file system when a malicious configuration file is loaded on to the software by a local user.

item.title: CVE-2023-1548|2024-08-02T05:49:11.660Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20control%20expert
item.description: A CWE-269: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability exists that could cause a local user to perform a denial of service through the console server service that is part of EcoStruxure Control Expert. Affected Products: EcoStruxure Control Expert (V15.1 and above)

item.title: CVE-2023-25619|2024-08-02T11:25:19.427Z -- schneider%20electric -- modicon%20m340%20cpu%20%28part%20numbers%20bmxp34%2A%29
item.description: A CWE-754: Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability exists that could cause denial of service of the controller when communicating over the Modbus TCP protocol.

item.title: CVE-2023-25548|2024-08-02T11:25:19.192Z -- schneider%20electric -- struxureware%20data%20center%20expert
item.description:
A CWE-863: Incorrect Authorization vulnerability exists that could allow access to device credentials on specific DCE endpoints not being properly secured when a hacker is using a low privileged user.
Affected products: StruxureWare Data Center Expert (V7.9.2 and prior)

item.title: CVE-2023-22611|2024-08-02T10:13:49.470Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20geo%20scada%20expert%202019%20-%202021%20%28formerly%20known%20as%20clearscada%29
item.description: A CWE-200: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability exists that could cause information disclosure when specific messages are sent to the server over the database server TCP port. Affected Products: EcoStruxure Geo SCADA Expert 2019 - 2021 (formerly known as ClearSCADA) (Versions prior to October 2022)

item.title: CVE-2023-25550|2024-08-02T11:25:18.948Z -- schneider%20electric -- struxureware%20data%20center%20expert
item.description:
A CWE-94: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability exists that allows remote code execution via the “hostname” parameter when maliciously crafted hostname syntax is entered.
Affected products: StruxureWare Data Center Expert (V7.9.2 and prior)

item.title: CVE-2023-22610|2024-08-02T10:13:49.385Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20geo%20scada%20expert%202019%20-%202021%20%28formerly%20known%20as%20clearscada%29
item.description: A CWE-863: Incorrect Authorization vulnerability exists that could cause Denial of Service against the Geo SCADA server when specific messages are sent to the server over the database server TCP port.

item.title: CVE-2023-5984|2024-08-02T08:14:25.140Z -- schneider%20electric -- ion8650
item.description: A CWE-494 Download of Code Without Integrity Check vulnerability exists that could allow modified firmware to be uploaded when an authorized admin user begins a firmware update procedure which could result in full control over the device.

item.title: CVE-2023-25549|2024-08-02T11:25:19.200Z -- schneider%20electric -- struxureware%20data%20center%20expert
item.description:
A CWE-94: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability exists that allows for remote code execution when using a parameter of the DCE network settings endpoint.
Affected products: StruxureWare Data Center Expert (V7.9.2 and prior)

item.title: CVE-2023-2570|2024-08-02T06:26:09.828Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20foxboro%20dcs%20control%20core%20services
item.description: A CWE-129: Improper Validation of Array Index vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service, and potentially kernel execution when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an unpredictable index to an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.title: CVE-2023-5630|2024-08-02T08:07:32.371Z -- schneider%20electric -- trio%20q-series%20ethernet%20data%20radio
item.description: A CWE-494: Download of Code Without Integrity Check vulnerability exists that could allow a privileged user to install an untrusted firmware.

item.title: CVE-2023-6407|2024-08-02T08:28:21.777Z -- schneider%20electric -- easy%20ups%20online%20monitoring%20software
item.description: A CWE-22: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability exists that could cause arbitrary file deletion upon service restart when accessed by a local and low-privileged attacker.

item.title: CVE-2023-5399|2024-08-02T07:59:44.730Z -- schneider%20electric -- c-bus%20toolkit
item.description: A CWE-22: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability exists that could cause tampering of files on the personal computer running C-Bus when using the File Command.

item.title: CVE-2023-5629|2024-08-02T08:07:32.488Z -- schneider%20electric -- trio%20q-series%20ethernet%20data%20radio
item.description: A CWE-601:URL Redirection to Untrusted Site (‘Open Redirect’) vulnerability exists that could cause disclosure of information through phishing attempts over HTTP.

item.title: CVE-2023-3953|2024-08-02T07:08:50.790Z -- schneider%20electric -- gp-pro%20ex%20wingp%20for%20ipc
item.description: A CWE-119: Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer vulnerability exists that could cause memory corruption when an authenticated user opens a tampered log file from GP-Pro EX.

item.title: CVE-2023-25554|2024-08-02T11:25:19.269Z -- schneider%20electric -- struxureware%20data%20center%20expert
item.description:
A CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability exists that allows a local privilege escalation on the appliance when a maliciously crafted Operating System command is entered on the device.
Affected products: StruxureWare Data Center Expert (V7.9.2 and prior)

item.title: CVE-2023-25551|2024-08-02T11:25:19.227Z -- schneider%20electric -- struxureware%20data%20center%20expert
item.description:
A CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability exists on a DCE file upload endpoint when tampering with parameters over HTTP.
Affected products: StruxureWare Data Center Expert (V7.9.2 and prior)

item.title: CVE-2023-5402|2024-08-02T07:59:44.294Z -- schneider%20electric -- c-bus%20toolkit
item.description: A CWE-269: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability exists that could cause a remote code execution when the transfer command is used over the network.

item.title: CVE-2023-5987|2024-08-02T08:14:25.122Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20power%20monitoring%20expert%20%28pme%29
item.description: A CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (Cross-site Scripting) vulnerability that could cause a vulnerability leading to a cross site scripting condition where attackers can have a victim’s browser run arbitrary JavaScript when they visit a page containing the injected payload.

item.title: CVE-2023-2569|2024-08-02T06:26:09.772Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20foxboro%20dcs%20control%20core%20services
item.description: A CWE-787: Out-of-Bounds Write vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service, elevation of privilege, and potentially kernel execution when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.title: CVE-2023-5986|2024-08-02T08:14:25.141Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20power%20monitoring%20expert%20%28pme%29
item.description: A CWE-601 URL Redirection to Untrusted Site vulnerability exists that could cause an openredirect vulnerability leading to a cross site scripting attack. By providing a URL-encoded input attackers can cause the software’s web application to redirect to the chosen domain after a successful login is performed.

item.title: CVE-2023-6032|2024-08-02T08:21:17.146Z -- schneider%20electric -- galaxy%20vs
item.description: A CWE-22: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability exists that could cause a file system enumeration and file download when an attacker navigates to the Network Management Card via HTTPS.

item.title: CVE-2023-4516|2024-08-02T07:31:06.157Z -- schneider%20electric -- igss%20update%20service%20%28igssupdateservice.exe%29
item.description: A CWE-306: Missing Authentication for Critical Function vulnerability exists in the IGSS Update Service that could allow a local attacker to change update source, potentially leading to remote code execution when the attacker force an update containing malicious content.

item.title: CVE-2023-3001|2024-08-02T06:41:04.132Z -- schneider%20electric -- igss%20dashboard%20%28dashboard.exe%29
item.description: A CWE-502: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability exists in the Dashboard module that could cause an interpretation of malicious payload data, potentially leading to remote code execution when an attacker gets the user to open a malicious file.

item.title: CVE-2023-25552|2024-08-02T11:25:19.289Z -- schneider%20electric -- struxureware%20data%20center%20expert
item.description:
A CWE-862: Missing Authorization vulnerability exists that could allow viewing of unauthorized content, changes or deleting of content, or performing unauthorized functions when tampering the Device File Transfer settings on DCE endpoints.
Affected products: StruxureWare Data Center Expert (V7.9.2 and prior)

item.title: CVE-2023-25553|2024-08-02T11:25:19.183Z -- schneider%20electric -- struxureware%20data%20center%20expert
item.description:
A CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability exists on a DCE endpoint through the logging capabilities of the webserver.
Affected products: StruxureWare Data Center Expert (V7.9.2 and prior)

item.title: CVE-2023-25555|2024-08-02T11:25:19.309Z -- schneider%20electric -- struxureware%20data%20center%20expert
item.description:
A CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') vulnerability exists that could allow a user that knows the credentials to execute unprivileged shell commands on the appliance over SSH.
Affected products: StruxureWare Data Center Expert (V7.9.2 and prior)

item.title: CVE-2023-1049|2024-08-02T05:32:46.335Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%E2%84%A2%20operator%20terminal%20expert
item.description: A CWE-94: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability exists that could cause execution of malicious code when an unsuspicious user loads a project file from the local filesystem into the HMI.

item.title: CVE-2024-5680|2024-08-01T21:18:06.841Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20foxboro%20dcs%20core%20control%20services
item.description: CWE-129: Improper Validation of Array Index vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.title: CVE-2024-6407|2024-08-01T21:41:03.280Z -- schneider%20electric -- wiser%20home%20controller%20whc-5918a
item.description: CWE-200: Information Exposure vulnerability exists that could cause disclosure of credentials when a specially crafted message is sent to the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-5558|2024-08-01T21:18:06.335Z -- schneider%20electric -- spacelogic%20as-p
item.description: CWE-367: Time-of-check Time-of-use (TOCTOU) Race Condition vulnerability exists that could cause escalation of privileges when an attacker abuses a limited admin account.

item.title: CVE-2024-5560|2024-08-01T21:18:06.538Z -- schneider%20electric -- sage%201410
item.description: CWE-125: Out-of-bounds Read vulnerability exists that could cause denial of service of the device’s web interface when an attacker sends a specially crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2024-5557|2024-08-01T21:18:06.830Z -- schneider%20electric -- spacelogic%20as-p
item.description: CWE-532: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability exists that could cause exposure of SNMP credentials when an attacker has access to the controller logs.

item.title: CVE-2024-5681|2024-08-01T21:18:06.902Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20foxboro%20dcs%20core%20control%20services
item.description: CWE-20: Improper Input Validation vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service, privilege escalation, and potentially kernel execution when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.title: CVE-2024-6528|2024-08-01T21:41:03.525Z -- schneider%20electric -- modicon%20controllers%20m241%20%2F%20m251
item.description: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability exists that could cause a vulnerability leading to a cross-site scripting condition where attackers can have a victim’s browser run arbitrary JavaScript when they visit a page containing the injected payload.

item.title: CVE-2024-5056|2024-08-01T21:03:10.683Z -- schneider%20electric -- modicon%20m340
item.description: CWE-552: Files or Directories Accessible to External Parties vulnerability exists which may prevent user to update the device firmware and prevent proper behavior of the webserver when specific files or directories are removed from the filesystem.

item.title: CVE-2024-5559|2024-08-01T21:18:06.557Z -- schneider%20electric -- powerlogic%20p5
item.description: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm vulnerability exists that could cause denial of service, device reboot, or an attacker gaining full control of the relay when a specially crafted reset token is entered into the front panel of the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-5313|2024-08-01T21:11:12.332Z -- schneider%20electric -- evlink%20home%20smart
item.description: CWE-668: Exposure of the Resource Wrong Sphere vulnerability exists that exposes a SSH interface over the product network interface. This does not allow to directly exploit the product or make any unintended operation as the SSH interface access is protected by an authentication mechanism. Impacts are limited to port scanning and fingerprinting activities as well as attempts to perform a potential denial of service attack on the exposed SSH interface.

item.title: CVE-2024-5679|2024-08-01T21:18:06.706Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20foxboro%20dcs%20core%20control%20services
item.description: CWE-787: Out-of-Bounds Write vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service, or kernel memory leak when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.title: CVE-2024-0568|2024-08-01T18:11:35.037Z -- schneider%20electric -- harmony%20control%20relay%20rmnf22tb30
item.description: CWE-287: Improper Authentication vulnerability exists that could cause unauthorized tampering of device configuration over NFC communication.

item.title: CVE-2024-0865|2024-08-01T18:18:18.824Z -- schneider%20electric -- ecostruxure%20it%20gateway
item.description: CWE-798: Use of hard-coded credentials vulnerability exists that could cause local privilege escalation when logged in as a non-administrative user.

item.title: CVE-2024-6407|2024-07-23T18:26:28.645Z -- schneider%20electric -- wiser%20home%20controller%20whc-5918a
item.description: CWE-200: Information Exposure vulnerability exists that could cause disclosure of credentials when a specially crafted message is sent to the device.

item.description: CWE-924: Improper Enforcement of Message Integrity During Transmission in a Communication Channel vulnerability exists that could cause a denial of service and loss of confidentiality, integrity of controllers when conducting a Man in the Middle attack.

item.description: CWE-787: Out-of-Bounds Write vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service, or kernel memory leak when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.description: CWE-20: Improper Input Validation vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service, privilege escalation, and potentially kernel execution when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.description: CWE-787: Out-of-Bounds Write vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service, or kernel memory leak when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.description: CWE-22: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability exists that could result in remote code execution when an authenticated user executes a saved project file that has been tampered by a malicious actor.

item.description: CWE-20: Improper Input Validation vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service, privilege escalation, and potentially kernel execution when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.description: CWE-129: Improper Validation of Array Index vulnerability exists that could cause local denial-of-service when a malicious actor with local user access crafts a script/program using an IOCTL call in the Foxboro.sys driver.

item.description: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm vulnerability exists that could cause denial of service, device reboot, or an attacker gaining full control of the relay when a specially crafted reset token is entered into the front panel of the device.

item.description: CWE-532: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability exists that could cause exposure of SNMP credentials when an attacker has access to the controller logs.

item.description: CWE-787: Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability exists that could result in an authentication bypass when sending a malformed POST request and particular configuration parameters are set.

item.description: CWE-428: Unquoted search path or element vulnerability exists in Easergy Studio, which could cause privilege escalation when a valid user replaces a trusted file name on the system and reboots the machine.

item.description: CWE-276: Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability exists that could allow an authenticated user with access to the device’s web interface to perform unauthorized file and firmware uploads when crafting custom web requests.

item.description: CWE-798: Use of hard-coded credentials vulnerability exists that could cause local privilege escalation when logged in as a non-administrative user.

item.description: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm vulnerability exists that could cause denial of service, device reboot, or an attacker gaining full control of the relay when a specially crafted reset token is entered into the front panel of the device.

item.description: CWE-668: Exposure of the Resource Wrong Sphere vulnerability exists that exposes a SSH interface over the product network interface. This does not allow to directly exploit the product or make any unintended operation as the SSH interface access is protected by an authentication mechanism. Impacts are limited to port scanning and fingerprinting activities as well as attempts to perform a potential denial of service attack on the exposed SSH interface.

item.description: CWE-522: Insufficiently Protected Credentials vulnerability exists that could cause unauthorized access to the project file in EcoStruxure Control Expert when a local user tampers with the memory of the engineering workstation.

item.description: CWE-798: Use of Hard-coded Credentials vulnerability exists that could cause unauthorized access to a project file protected with application password when opening the file with EcoStruxure Control Expert.

item.description: CWE-287: Improper Authentication vulnerability exists that could cause unauthorized tampering of device configuration over NFC communication.

item.description: CWE-502: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability exists that could cause remote code execution when a malicious project file is loaded into the application by a valid user.

item.description: CWE-552: Files or Directories Accessible to External Parties vulnerability exists that could allow unauthenticated files and logs exfiltration and download of files when an attacker modifies the URL to download to a different location.

item.title: CVE-2024-2051|2024-03-18T16:03:44.987Z -- schneider%20electric -- easergy%20t200%20%28modbus%29%20models%3A%20t200i%2C%20t200e%2C%20t200p%2C%20t200s%2C%20t200h
item.description: CWE-307: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts vulnerability exists that could cause account takeover and unauthorized access to the system when an attacker conducts brute-force attacks against the login form.

item.title: CVE-2024-2050|2024-03-18T16:04:57.375Z -- schneider%20electric -- easergy%20t200%20%28modbus%29%20models%3A%20t200i%2C%20t200e%2C%20t200p%2C%20t200s%2C%20t200h
item.description: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (‘Cross-site Scripting’) vulnerability exists when an attacker injects then executes arbitrary malicious JavaScript code within the context of the product.

item.description: CWE-552: Files or Directories Accessible to External Parties vulnerability exists which may prevent user to update the device firmware and prevent proper behavior of the webserver when specific files or directories are removed from the filesystem.

item.description: CWE-668: Exposure of the Resource Wrong Sphere vulnerability exists that exposes a SSH interface over the product network interface. This does not allow to directly exploit the product or make any unintended operation as the SSH interface access is protected by an authentication mechanism. Impacts are limited to port scanning and fingerprinting activities as well as attempts to perform a potential denial of service attack on the exposed SSH interface.

item.description: CWE-552: Files or Directories Accessible to External Parties vulnerability exists which may prevent user to update the device firmware and prevent proper behavior of the webserver when specific files or directories are removed from the filesystem.

item.description: CWE-367: Time-of-check Time-of-use (TOCTOU) Race Condition vulnerability exists that could cause escalation of privileges when an attacker abuses a limited admin account.

item.description: CWE-252: Unchecked Return Value vulnerability exists that could cause denial of service of the device when an attacker sends a specially crafted HTTP request.
